categories: Category:Articles that are known by a nickname

nodes.text: BK-298 was a female human who was a Rebel Alliance sleeper operative. Hypnotic suggestions ensured she believed herself to be a loyal stormtrooper of the Galactic Empire instead of a Rebel spy.
In the 2015 iOS video game Star Wars: Uprising, BK-298 was one of the many crew members that could be sent on Crew Runs for helpful items.
